Class AssertingRestTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.client.support.HttpAccessor
      • org.springframework.http.client.support.InterceptingHttpAccessor
        • org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate
          • tools.AssertingRestTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.client.RestOperations

    public class AssertingRestTemplate
extends org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate
    RestTemplate that logs erroneous responses and throws AssertionsError on any connection issues
    Author:
    Marcin Grzejszczak
